# Fastmeal Contracts

## Logic

### FastMeal(FTL) Tokenomics

```text
Name: FastMeal
Symbol: $FTL
Decimals: 6
Total Supply: 1.5 billion $FTL tokens
Presale: 30% (450 million $FTL)
Giveaway/Airdrop: 5% (75 million $FTL)
Team: 10% (150 million $FTL)
Uniswap Liquidity: 7% (105 million $FTL)
Treasury: 15% (225 million $FTL)
Advisor: 3% (45 million $FTL)
Reward Pool: 10% (150 million $FTL)
Work-to-Earn: 20% (300 million $FTL)
```

### Presale Logic

```text
Presale Strategy
FastMeal Token Presale
Name: FastMeal
Symbol: $FTL
Decimals: 6
Total Supply: 1.5 billion $FTL tokens
Presale: 30% (450 million $FTL)
     Phase 1:
     - Allocation: 5% of Private and Presale (22,500,000 $FTL)
     - Price per Token: $0.01 per $FTL
     - Total Funds Raised in Phase 1: $225,000
```

## Testnet Addresses

```text
Deployer: 0x2faf8ab2b9ac8Bd4176A0B9D31502bA3a59B4b41
```

### FastMeal Addresses

```text
Goerli
    _NAME: FastMeal
    _SYMBOL: $FTL
    _LZENDPOINT: 0xbfD2135BFfbb0B5378b56643c2Df8a87552Bfa23
    _INITIALSUPPLY: 1500000000000000 (1_500_000_000_000_000, 1.5 Billion)
    Parameters: 

    FastMeal: 0xdf038719528eE246A08F01a29678B5d3387EC694
    Verified

        setTrustedRemoteAddress
            _remoteChainId: 10102
            _remoteAddress: 0xFce807fD77651E20FAdBAb378f7485D42d54Ac51

BSC Testnet
    _NAME: FastMeal
    _SYMBOL: $FTL
    _LZENDPOINT: 0x6Fcb97553D41516Cb228ac03FdC8B9a0a9df04A1
    _INITIALSUPPLY: 0 (0)
    Parameters: 

    FastMeal: 0xFce807fD77651E20FAdBAb378f7485D42d54Ac51
    Verified

        setTrustedRemoteAddress
            _remoteChainId: 10121
            _remoteAddress: 0xdf038719528eE246A08F01a29678B5d3387EC694
```

### MockUSDT Addresses

```text
Goerli
    Tether USD
    USDT
    6
        _initialSupply (uint256): 100000000000
        _name (string): Tether USD
        _symbol (string): USDT
        _decimals (uint256): 6
    TetherToken: 0x3F2C908a3C236b4e3c32Bfb37DB823B54d21999B

BSC Testnet
    Tether USD
    USDT
    18
    BEP20USDT: 0x904bfC5AaF5A099bdAaF2d5fcDd55dE6Bc6dda29
    Verified
```

### Presale Addresses

```text
Goerli
    Implement - FastMealPresalePhase1: 0x24e6F286F93C1F5838a3EC48255bA6e05D3d89a5
    Verified
    ProxyAdmin: 0x64Ff31e22a959CfC553F886082afa44f08aDd779
    Verified

        _LOGIC: 0x24e6F286F93C1F5838a3EC48255bA6e05D3d89a5
        ADMIN_: 0x64Ff31e22a959CfC553F886082afa44f08aDd779

            function initialize(
                IERC20 _usdt: 0x3F2C908a3C236b4e3c32Bfb37DB823B54d21999B
                IERC20 _ftl: 0xdf038719528eE246A08F01a29678B5d3387EC694
                uint256 _tokenPriceNum: 1 (0.01$, ftl decimals: 6, usdt decimals: 6)
                uint256 _tokenPriceDen: 100
                uint256 _startTime: 1696710000 (Sun Oct 08 2023 05:20:00 GMT+0900 (Yakutsk Standard Time))
                uint256 _endTime: 1696720000 (Sun Oct 08 2023 08:06:40 GMT+0900 (Yakutsk Standard Time))
                uint256 _vestingDuration: 46656000 (18*30*24*3600) (18 months)
                uint256 _cliffTime: 2592000 (30*24*3600) (1 month)
            )
        _DATA: 
        
        Parameters: 
    
    TransparentUpgradeableProxy(Proxy): 0xb500109dCA564e41386935dC19E16d79A4672655
    Verified

BSC Testnet
    Implement - FastMealPresalePhase1: 0x5bBa59f8CD041adaa667e0B5beC5Bf11F0F32ec5
    Verified
    ProxyAdmin: 0xd4e2519B23b0981d6cF286aF1Fe53df3b5174976
    Verified

        _LOGIC: 0x5bBa59f8CD041adaa667e0B5beC5Bf11F0F32ec5
        ADMIN_: 0xd4e2519B23b0981d6cF286aF1Fe53df3b5174976

            function initialize(
                IERC20 _usdt: 0x904bfC5AaF5A099bdAaF2d5fcDd55dE6Bc6dda29

                uint256 _tokenPriceNum: 10000000000 (1 * 10 ** (18 - 6)) (0.01$, ftl decimals: 6, usdt decimals: 18)

                uint256 _startTime: 1696710000 (Sun Oct 08 2023 05:20:00 GMT+0900 (Yakutsk Standard Time))
                uint256 _endTime: 1696720000 (Sun Oct 08 2023 08:06:40 GMT+0900 (Yakutsk Standard Time))
                uint256 _vestingDuration: 46656000 (18*30*24*3600) (18 months)
                uint256 _cliffTime: 2592000 (30*24*3600) (1 month)
            )
        _DATA:

    Verified
```
